item.description:
As always, if you have a manuscript to share, please email it to me at your earliest convenience so I assure you that there will be time enough in the session to get to your poem, and to make copies for all those attending. As at all our meetings, if you have a particular topic or corpus that's really been preoccupying you, you have the option of taking the floor and holding forth with a pocket lecture. Yes, we're just that accommodating.

If this would be your first time attending, please get in touch with me so I can cue you in as to what to expect. I'm always available to answer questions.
item.name: Weekly Workshop
